This game's athmosphere is so intriguing and sucks me in instantly. Everytime I open this game I finish it in one sitting. This is also the case in the other episodes and on top of that the combat and puzzles are challenging enough where its not bullshit but also not baby o-clock it is the perfect amount of challange for me. The game still holds up incredibly well even after 17 years. But the antlion part is fucking annoying and I hate it more than my life though so it's a 2/10 game sorry Gaben shouldn't have added that dumbass part

An old classic! The story is fantastic and still plays well against games today. I remember playing this as a kid and loving the characters and the style of game play. A few jump scare moments (even today), but so much fun! The graphics are dated obviously, but I love the initial game design and style. A recommended classic play for those who are after something nostalgic and whimsical!

Wowee, what a game. Just finished it as I'm writing this review as a matter a fact.

I honestly enjoyed every minute of it, however i do believe that some puzzles are too vague. Like the one where you have to shoot the tire-stopper things from underneath the truck to tear down the power tower things? Yep. Or what about the hidden vent you have to go through in the Laboratory chapter? Checkaroo.

It's definitely worth a buy and a full-play. And GODDAMN THATS A LOT OF PEOPLE WHO WORKED ON THIS GAME

awesome game, a true classic with a great story amazing characters captivating dialogue and amazing game play, although the game play shows its age it still is a blast to play through. play half life 1 as well.

Graphics even for 2021 is good, game mechanics are innovative and interesting.
